About the Company: RLF Ltd is engaged in the business of financial services, hire purchase and leasing. The company proposes to diversify in to cultivation and canning of white button mushrooms in the assisted sector with Haryana Agro Industries Corporation (HAIC) and financial-cum-technical collaboration with Dalsem Veciap b v Agro Industries..The company also in the business segment of Embroidery, Synthetic Sports.
